meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6839.

div.div: Battle of the Decades final game 1.

td.p: Roger Craig, a data scientist from Brooklyn, New York
Ken Jennings, a writer from Seattle, Washington
Brad Rutter, an actor and producer from Hollywood, California

tr.td: CHESS DRAMA
OUR FEATHERED FRIENDS
A BLANK EXPRESSION
PARENTING & CHILDREN
U.S. GEOGRAPHY
DOCUMENTARIES

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Brad
Ken
Roger
ELIZABETHAN PLAYS & PLAYWRIGHTS
MEDICAL TERMS
MISHMASH
HISTORIC DAYS
(Alex: We'll give you a historic date. You tell us the most important event that occurred on that date.)
HATE SONGS
SOUNDS LIKE A NEW ELEMENT!
(Alex: Each correct response will end in the three letters "I-U-M". Trebekium. That's an example.)

(Roger: It\'s a two-day final, right?)

the Lincoln assassination

KenRoger
')
